attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Analyze '{{ idea.concept }}' for {{ idea.target }}. Budget: {{ config.budget }}, Timeline: {{ config.timeline }}. Recommend critical features.

nodes.name: Discovery
nodes.title: Discovery phase uses LLM reasoning to adaptively analyze concepts and recommend features based on constraints.

nodes.name: Execution
nodes.title: Execution phase combines design thinking with technical prototyping. Build task is async for parallel work.

nodes.name: Review
nodes.title: Review gates production deployment. Failures loop back to discovery with learnings, demonstrating iterative evolution.
